review: Awesome! Great purchase that takes your home entertainment to the next level. Definitely recommend.
author: Andrew D.

review: Bought this with my old account and just reviewing it now! Have had it for about 4 months and have to say I love it. Works great when I want to cast something from my laptop or phone. Just select the network and tap the cast button. Was easy to set up and has since gotten a couple updates. You can even cast your computer screen so its like having a huge computer monitor!  For 35$, it beats out the Roku for sure!
author: M. Brown

review: Useless!  Already had a netflix player in my game console.  I was hoping to be able to mirror my computer monitor onto my LCD TV with it.  Sadly it would not.....neither does Roku!
author: Lee Brown

review: Purchased for my parents for Christmas last year. They are not super tech savvy but with just a little bit of coaching (and a little cheat sheet of instructions from me) my parents were able to watch YouTube and Netflix on their big, new TV without worrying about connecting their computer to it. Works great even after all this time and I'd highly recommend it for anyone who doesn't have another form of streaming box (like a PS3, etc.)
author: Jon Solomon

review: Works as adertised.  Fun.  A bit of work to set up, but not too challenging.  Easy to use.

review: For the price, this is a great little toy.  But we don't use it very often because we have most of the same features on our TiVo.  We only plug it in when we want to stream something from a laptop from Chrome.
